text: What is the best way to edit the email body padding with drag and drop emails? It seems like the settings page value does not affect drag and drop emails

Hi! :slightly_smiling_face: I'm having a problem with the email template I'm using via Drag and Drop Beta, and I'm asked to adjust the spacing from a pre-existing padding/spaces, is there a way for me to override them? at this moment, i used module, which is pretty fine by me (but not with the other people editing it as their not html/developer friendly), the problem is when i sent a sample look to my email everything i made is messed up in the email client (in this case it's outlook) meaning it's not carbon copy of what i did in the template. below is the screenshot on what the table looks like in outlook:
